TopicTitle: Parachute Safe-to-Deploy Status indicators on Staging Display

Articles.Content: While it is good to have the "Unsafe" "Risky" and "Safe" status indicators when you right click on the parachute part, a more user-friendly solution would be to have a Red-light, Yellow-light, Green-light icon on the icons for each part in the staging list (bottom left of the window). Currently the icon shows red when it has failed, but maybe 'failedÃƒÂ¤ status could be changed to black to keep red for 'unsafe' status. These would only need to show once in atmosphere.
